comments:
Description:
IllegalArgumentException when click TOC option in drill-through which link to document.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Define a drill-through link to a report document which contains toc definition.
2. Input document name
3. Tick Table Of Content entry in Target Report

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
IllegalArgumentException throws out and then after closing hyperlink dialog, click the Open Hyperlink Options button cannot open the dialog again.
